parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Path, filename, and name of the type of structural member to insert

parameters.name: EndCond
parameters.description: End condition as defined in swSOLIDWORKSWeldmentEndCondOptions_e

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation of the sketch about the sketch segment

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge the bodies of the arc segments to the adjacent bodies, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertStructuralWeldment3
signature:
Feature InsertStructuralWeldment3( 
   System.String
Path
,
   System.Int32
EndCond
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Boolean
Merge
,
   System.Object
Groups
)

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: Path, filename, and name of the type of structural member to insert

parameters.name: EndCond
parameters.description: End condition as defined in swSOLIDWORKSWeldmentEndCondOptions_e

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of rotation of the sketch about the sketch segment

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge the bodies of the arc segments to the adjacent bodies, false to not

remarks:
Use
IFeatureManager::CreateStructuralMemberGroup
,
IStructuralMemberFeatureData::Groups
, or
IStructuralMemberFeatureData::IGetGroups
to populate the
Groups
parameter.
